outfit_data.top: A cream silk blouse with a subtly draped neckline and long sleeves. The fabric has a subtle sheen and falls loosely for a relaxed yet elegant look.
outfit_data.bottom: Khaki gabardine trousers with a straight leg cut and high waist. They are tailored for a sleek silhouette and feature a slightly cropped length.
outfit_data.shoes: Black leather pointed-toe pumps with a slender heel. The shoes have a minimal design, complementing the outfit's clean lines.
outfit_data.extras: A taupe wool wrap or cardigan can be added for a touch of warmth if needed. A small black clutch bag will complete the sophisticated ensemble.
